reviewText: I don't care how much this cost, this is crap. this was filmed in the early 70's, bad quality and it covers absolutely nothing. They will give you a word like "Car" and then show you a pictire of a Car and then the German Translation. This is a Video "Flash Card". I threw it away.
A pretty good all-round option for learning German. However it is made from a string US (foreign)  perspective rather than showing more of the German culture and local individualities of German.
